BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_MST (NUM_PAY_CODE, STR_PAY_SCALE_CATEGORY, NUM_PAY_SCALE_TYPE, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_F_MAP (NUM_PAY_CODE, NUM_PAY_SEQ_ID, NUM_PAY_START_BASIC, NUM_INCREMENT_AMT, NUM_PAY_END_BASIC, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_S_MAP (NUM_PAY_CODE, STR_PAY_BAND, NUM_PAY_SEQ_ID, NUM_PAY_START_BASIC, NUM_PAY_END_BASIC, NUM_GRADE_PAY, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_MST A WHERE A.NUM_PAY_CODE=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_F_MAP A WHERE A.NUM_PAY_CODE=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_S_MAP A WHERE A.NUM_PAY_CODE=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1), T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_F_MAP T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1), T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_S_MAP T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1), T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_F_MAP T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_S_MAP T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PIST_PAYFIXATION_MST (NUM_PAY_ID, STR_PAY_SCALE_TCODE, NUM_INCR_SEQ, NUM_F_BASIC_PAY, NUM_INCREMENT_AMT, NUM_E_BASIC_PAY, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_MST SET GNUM_ISVALID=2 WHERE NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_F_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=2 WHERE NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_GN_PAYFIXATION_S_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=2 WHERE NUM_PAY_CODE =? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
